instruction: Research and list the health benefits of eating apples.
output: Apples are a superfood with a wide range of health benefits. Eating apples can help boost your immune system, protect against cancer, and reduce your risk of stroke and heart disease. Apples are a source of dietary fiber and antioxidants, which can help keep your digestive system healthy. They are also a source of phytonutrients, which can help reduce inflammation in the body and reduce cholesterol levels. Additionally, apples can help keep your blood sugar levels stable, improve your skin and hair health, and even aid in weight loss.
